publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/07/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To cash P by Mr Kelly
To cash to go to Boston fifteen Dollars
By board of Bassett 30x p day
By 14 Elm Trees in the year 1841
To cash four Dollars dld wife
To cash 18/ to go to Funeral
